message: Let's start with a fair split.  I'm happy to take a bit less if you agree.
I think we can both do better than a 60/40 split.  Let's be fair and go with 60/40 in my favor this time.
I'm willing to compromise, but I need to get more than 4000.  Let's split it 55/45 in my favor this time, and we can avoid further inflation.
